content.raw:
I have the following problem when I try to compile gazebo-trunk:

[ 79%] Building CXX object gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeFiles/SDF_TEST.dir/SDF_TEST.cc.o
/home/daniel/src/gazebo-dev/gazebo/sdf/interface/SDF_TEST.cc:18:25: erro fatal: gtest/gtest.h: Arquivo ou diretório não encontrado
compilação terminada.
make[2]: ** [gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeFiles/SDF_TEST.dir/SDF_TEST.cc.o] Erro 1
make[1]: ** [gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeFiles/SDF_TEST.dir/all] Erro 2
make: ** [all] Erro 2

Looking this file there is a directive #include <gtest/gtest.h>, wich expect the gtest library was installed in the machine. But gazebo source has gtest in test folder, so I don't know if it is a bug or it is expected that user has gtest installed on system.
content.html:
I have the following problem when I try to compile gazebo-trunk:

[ 79%] Building CXX object gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeFiles/SDF_TEST.dir/SDF_TEST.cc.o /home/daniel/src/gazebo-dev/gazebo/sdf/interface/SDF_TEST.cc:18:25: erro fatal: gtest/gtest.h: Arquivo ou diretório não encontrado compilação terminada. make[2]: [gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeFiles/SDF_TEST.dir/SDF_TEST.cc.o] Erro 1 make[1]: [gazebo/sdf/interface/CMakeFiles/SDF_TEST.dir/all] Erro 2 make: ** [all] Erro 2

Looking this file there is a directive #include <gtest/gtest.h>, wich expect the gtest library was installed in the machine. But gazebo source has gtest in test folder, so I don't know if it is a bug or it is expected that user has gtest installed on system.
